title: The Flightless Ostrich
description: The Ostrich is the largest and heaviest living bird. Native to Africa, it is also known for laying the largest eggs of any land animal.

questions.question: What is the average speed of a running ostrich?
What is a unique characteristic of an ostrich's eye?
options: It can see in the dark
It is bigger than its brain
It changes color with the seasons
questions.correct_answer: It is bigger than its brain

questions.question: What is the weight of an average ostrich egg?
True or false: An ostrich buries its head in the sand when it is scared.
Ostriches have a unique digestive system that allows them to swallow which of the following to help grind food?
